long_description: Garmin Out-Front bike mount puts your Garmin Edge computer out in front of your handlebar for easier viewing and safer use. Plastic mount clamps around 31.8mm handlebars; included shim lets you use the Out-Front mount with 26mm handlebars. Designed for use with Garmin Edge cycling computers (sold separately).
short_description: Garmin Out-Front bike mount puts your Garmin Edge computer out in front of your handlebar for easier viewing and safer use.
